name: The Pink Spider (Jrock/Visual Kei/Digital Art)
description:
The Pink Spider

UPDATE:

  1. Needs a retrain

  2. USE both OUR LORA and the extracted LoRa plus magic waifu devil magic to get better pics.

If you want to donate towards costs and don't want to subscribe:

https://ko-fi.com/DUSKFALLcrew

If you want to monthly support the EARTH & DUSK media projects and not just AI:

https://www.patreon.com/earthndusk

IF YOU WANT THIS TO BE AMAZING and you want fun results

use scruffy's amazing LORA they extracted!

Trained on over 100 Hideto Matsumoto images.

This takes a VERY weird take on the former Japanese Rock star.

If you want to know more about his music watch videos on this channel

SOME EXAMPLE IMAGES WERE CREATED USING IMG2IMG with the original training data to show more of hide's style.

VAES USED:

Hakurei's (LINKED TO KENSHI'S MODEL)

MoistMix (LINKED TO MOISTMIX MODEL)

STANDARD SD 1.5 VAE's

VAE is optional, but these are the ones we tested for fun

Image here is actually of our digital art done in 2018 via IPAD/Procreate. Do not RESELL this image, but DO use it as a base to play with in IMG2IMG.

and hide: may you be ever free.

P.S. If anyone can make LORA's from our models GO FOR GOLD, we'll either give you the training data or just let you extract it as long as you link back to the original models!
